result.execSummary:
The defendant Torrist D. Cannon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Torrist D. Cannon is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Torrist D. Cannon was found guilty of Armed Robbery [Modifiers: Repeater], a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees. 
** Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges. Submit a DNA sample (unless previously provided).
** Pay DNA surcharge.  
** Pay restitution plus surcharges.  May Not have contact with victim

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Torrist D. Cannon

records.addlTxt: Revoked - Sentenced to Prison.
No return to court

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Court reporter transcript invoice for 6/6/16 sentencing paid by county $34.00.
6/6/16 - Sentencing Hearing
Conditions of Extended Supervision
For Cts 2 & 3 only - Dismissed.
Restitution in the amount of $350
For Restitution Order - filed by ADA J Kraus.
Conditions of Probation Imposed by the Judge
deft sentenced to 14yrs WSP; initial confinement of 42mos followed by 126mos of ES.  Deft not eligible for CIP or SAP

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Carl Johnson.  Alexander H. (brother of deft) present; made a statement on behalf of deft.  Sentencing arguments made.  Deft sentenced to 14yrs WSP; initial confinement of 42mos followed by 126mos of ES. See ES conditions.  Deft not eligible for CIP or SAP.  Credit for 215 days.  DNA ordered; notice given to deft.  Appeal rights.  Firearm warning.  Voting acknowledgment.  Deft stipulates to restitution in the amount of $350
Court Report prepared by Carol C Peters, Client Services Specialist (PD's office)
Sentencing hearing on June 6, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
email received from defense counsel requesting an adjournment of the sentencing hrg on 5/16/16; no objection by the State.  Sentencing hrg reset to 6/6/16 @ 3pm
Amended

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Carl Johnson.  Case is resolved.  Victim rights compliance.  Amended information filed.  Deft pleads guilty to count 1; found guilty by the Court.  Admits to repeater.  Remaining counts are dismissed on State's motion.  PSI ordered.  Sentencing set for 5/16/16 @ 3pm.
Final pre-trial on April 5, 2016 at 10:45 am.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Carl Johnson.  Report has been received; report states the deft is competent to proceed at this time.  All parties concur with the findings in report.  Deft is competent to proceed at this time.  Defense requests a FPT in approx 4 weeks; no objection by the State.  FPT set for 4/6/16 @ 11am.
Further proceedings at 03-08-2016 09:30 am - rescheduled/funeral services for Hon. Michael Wilk
Hrg for 3/7/16 will be rescheduled to accommodate funeral for Hon. Michael Wilk
Report of Dr. John Pankiewicz, board certified psychiatrist at Wisconsin Forensic Unit
Fax Transmittal Sheet
for Competency Examination by DHS  kmk

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Carl Johnson.  Deft filed a subst. of judge request; will not be honored since it is not sponsored by his atty.  In addition, the request is tardy.  Defense counsel raises issue of competency.  Brief discussion held.  Court orders a 15-day in-patient competency eval.  FP set for 3/7/16 @ 11:15am
of Judge Schroeder - filed by deft pro se (copy provided to attys)
FPT moved to 2/17/16 @ 1:15pm on request of defense counsel; no objection by ADA Kraus.  Email sent to conveyance since the deft is in custody.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Carl Johnson.  Case is resolved.  Victim rights compliance.  Information orally amended to include all elements of the crime re: count 1.  Hrg interrupted during the plea colliquey; deft would like add'l time to speak w/his counsel.  Court takes a short recess.  Court reconvenes.  Atty Carl Johnson requests a short adjournment of this hrg.  Plea hrg set for 2/10/16 @ 3pm.
FPT moved from 2/3/16 to 2/5/16 @ 9:15am.  Conveyance notified & attys notified
Scheduling Order

Defendant Torrist D. Cannon appeared with Attorney Carl Bradford Johnson.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JThwing. Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found. Bound over to Br 3.  Information filed, reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 3, 2016 at 01:50 pm.  Jury selection scheduled for February 22, 2016 at 09:00 am.
to Preliminary Hearing
Filed by Atty C Johnson.
Atty:  C Johnson

*No Contact w/ Luka R or Richard F or their residences

140pm  Special Prosecutor Attorney Daniel Tombasco  appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Rocco Defilippis.  Clerk JThwing. Minutes:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Commissioner on November 24, 2015 at 08:45 am.  $10,000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  Court dismisses Ct.2.  kmk
